name: Witchlight
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Dispel Magic Weakness
text: Casting dispel magic on a witchlight paralyzes it for 1d10 rounds.

trait.name: Luminance
text: A witchlight normally glows as brightly as a torch. The creature can dim itself to the luminosity of a candle, but it cannot extinguish its light. Because of its glow, the witchlight has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Thin As Light
text: While a witchlight is not incorporeal, it can pass through any opening that light can.

action.name: Light Ray
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) radiant damage.

action.name: Flash (Recharge 5-6)
text: The witchlight emits a bright burst of light that blinds all sighted creatures within 30 feet for 1d4 rounds unless they succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw.
